titles.title: Equine Equity Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the tax treatment of horses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5309)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
4/30/2007--Introduced.
Equine Equity Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) treat any race horse as three-year property for depreciation purposes; and (2) reduce to 12 months the holding period for capital gains treatment of horses.
